name: The A and B in Rainbow
name_original: The A and B in Rainbow
description: This is a game where you (an LGBTQ person) must collect all of the Asexual and Bisexual flags so that they are no longer on their own but contained in the LGBTQ community.  This is important because Ace and Bi people are so often excluded from both straight society and the LGBTQ community.  This game is to show Ace and Bi people that no matter what anyone says they belong in the community.  To exclude from the community that should help protect all LGBTQ people is a disservice and only serves to weaken the movement.  I have used music from "8 Bit Rainbow Ride!" Fast Upbeat Game Music by HeatleyBros.  I have taken a template from edermunizz on itch.io and edited it.
